game.name: Arcane Veins
game.shortDescription: Arcane Veins is a roguelike deckbuilder. Build your deck, chain together spells in your wand, and overpower your enemies as you descend through the darkness uncovering all the secrets the cave has to offer.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Arcane Veins is a roguelike deckbuilder. Build your deck, chain together spells in your wand, and overpower your enemies as you descend through the darkness uncovering all the secrets the cave has to offer.
